com.st.st25sdk.command

Class FastTransferModeCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.command.FastTransferModeCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastTransferModeInterface

    public class FastTransferModeCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements FastTransferModeInterface
    Defines methods to build the Fast Transfer Mode commands related to MailBox management (Fast Transfer Mode)

      • FastTransferModeCommand

        public FastTransferModeCommand(Iso15693CustomCommand cmd,
                               byte[] uid,
                               int mailboxSize)
        Constructor for high-level Fast Transfer Mode/MailBox commands
        Parameters:
        cmd - Iso15693 Custom Commands used to control FTM/MB
        uid - tag's UID
        mailboxSize - size of the mailbox memory

    • Method Detail

      • writeMailboxMessage

        public byte writeMailboxMessage(byte[] buffer)
                         throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        writeMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeMailboxMessage

        public byte writeMailboxMessage(int size,
                                byte[] buffer)
                         throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        writeMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeMailboxMessage

        public byte writeMailboxMessage(int size,
                                byte[] buffer,
                                byte flag)
                         throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        writeMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in mailbox
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • readMailboxMessage

        public byte[] readMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                                 int size)
                          throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        readMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • readMailboxMessage

        public byte[] readMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                                 int size,
                                 byte flag)
                          throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        readMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • readMailboxMessageLength

        public int readMailboxMessageLength()
                             throws STException
        Returns (MailBox message length - 1). Add 1 to the result to get the actual mailbox message length. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command.
        Specified by:
        readMailboxMessageLength in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Returns:
        MailBox message length minus 1 byte (so that 0xFF matches the max size of MAILBOX_SIZE bytes)
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        public byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(byte[] buffer)
                             throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastWriteMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        public byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size,
                                    byte[] buffer)
                             throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastWriteMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in MailBox
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastWriteMailboxMessage

        public byte fastWriteMailboxMessage(int size,
                                    byte[] buffer,
                                    byte flag)
                             throws STException
        Writes data in the tag's MailBox starting at first location 0 using Fast Write Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastWriteMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        size - number of bytes to be written in the MailBox message Set to 1 to write a single byte. Ranges from 1 to MAILBOX_SIZE.
        buffer - data to copy in mailbox
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • fastReadMailboxMessage

        public byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                                     int size)
                              throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastReadMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • fastReadMailboxMessage

        public byte[] fastReadMailboxMessage(int mbAddress,
                                     int size,
                                     byte flag)
                              throws STException
        Reads data in the tag's MailBox starting at specified location using Fast Read Message command. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastReadMailboxMessage in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Parameters:
        mbAddress - location in the MailBox where to read data (from 0 to MAILBOX_SIZE-1)
        size - number of bytes to read If size = 0 and mbAddress = 0, the command returns ALL bytes available in the mailbox message from the specified location
        flag - Request flag for the command
        Returns:
        data read from the mailbox as a byte array. The first byte returned is the Iso15693 status byte.
        Throws:
        STException - If mbAddress = 0 AND size = 1, a BAD_PARAMETER exception will be thrown as the tag cannot return a single byte from the mailbox at address 0

      • fastReadMailboxMessageLength

        public int fastReadMailboxMessageLength()
                                 throws STException
        Returns (MailBox message length - 1) using Fast Read Message Length command. Add 1 to the result to get the actual mailbox message length. Fast Transfer Mode must be enabled prior to sending this command. The rf reader must support fast responses format from the tag.
        Specified by:
        fastReadMailboxMessageLength in interface FastTransferModeInterface
        Returns:
        MailBox message length minus 1 byte (so that 0xFF matches the max size of MAILBOX_SIZE bytes)
        Throws:
        STException
